actions.committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to improve the law in the District of Columbia with respect to the crime of rape.

summary.text: Provides that any person who forcibly has sexual intercourse with another person shall be quilty of rape. Defines the term rape as also including sodomy. Provides for criminal penalties for violations of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to improve the law in the District of Columbia with respect to the crime of rape.
